title: 47. Acne Tips, Getting a Job Post-Grad, Choosing A Product Line for Your Spa + Skin Myths | Answering your DM's
description:
Hi Treatment Roomies! In today's episode we are answering your DM's and discussing the biggest skincare myths that we hear a lot, how to pick a product line to work with in the spa, acne tips, etc. We hope you enjoy!

Michele Phelan Chemical Peel Episode #32 find it on iTunes / Spotify

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics + Lauren's Website: www.lauren-kruger.com

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly

Music by LiQwYd

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
